00011 // scale.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "texture.h"
00014 #include "paramset.h"
00015 // ScaleTexture Declarations
00016 template <class T1, class T2>
00017 class ScaleTexture : public Texture<T2> {
00018 public:
00019         // ScaleTexture Public Methods
00020         ScaleTexture(Reference<Texture<T1> > t1,
00021                         Reference<Texture<T2> > t2) {
00022                 tex1 = t1;
00023                 tex2 = t2;
00024         }
00025         T2 Evaluate(
00026                         const DifferentialGeometry &dg) const {
00027                 return tex1->Evaluate(dg) * tex2->Evaluate(dg);
00028         }
00029 private:
00030         Reference<Texture<T1> > tex1;
00031         Reference<Texture<T2> > tex2;
00032 };
00033 // ScaleTexture Method Definitions
00034 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Texture<float> * CreateFloatTexture(const Transform &tex2world,
00035                 const TextureParams &tp) {
00036         return new ScaleTexture<float, float>(tp.GetFloatTexture("tex1", 1.f),
00037                 tp.GetFloatTexture("tex2", 1.f));
00038 }
00039 
00040 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Texture<Spectrum> * CreateSpectrumTexture(const Transform &tex2world,
00041                 const TextureParams &tp) {
00042         return new ScaleTexture<Spectrum, Spectrum>(
00043                 tp.GetSpectrumTexture("tex1", Spectrum(1.f)),
00044                 tp.GetSpectrumTexture("tex2", Spectrum(1.f)));
00045 }
